description:
Overview
--------

Many people have probably used Locust or a tool built on top of it (like
Load Forge) in the past. These tools are primarily used for web
application load testing by hitting public endpoints and monitoring how
they respond. In this talk we review how to use Locust to load test a
PostgreSQL database.

Additional Info
---------------

This is a link to an article I wrote about this topic:
https://miguel-codes.medium.com/unconventional-load-testing-leveraging-python-locust-for-postgresql-stress-testing-d6e07d63714b
title: Stress Less: Easy Database Load Testing Using Python and Locust
